original_text: But the land, whither ye go to possess it, is a land of hills and valleys, and drinketh water of the rain of heaven:
korean_text: 너희가 건너가서 차지할 땅은 산과 골짜기가 있어서 하늘에서 내리는 비를 흡수하는 땅이요

sentences.original_text: whither ye go to possess it
is a land of hills and valleys
and drinketh water of the rain of heaven
